title: Toto - Toto IV [SACD] upmix DTS 5.1ch @1234kbps (2nd release)
description:
Toto - Toto IV [SACD] upmix DTS 5.1ch @1234kbps

The audio source is the SACD 2.0 (Remaster 1999), I ripped it in PCM 32/88.2kHz
 
The upmix treatment was done with Audition CC in a professionnal studio.

This is not the same treatment as the first version. It sounds better and files can be directly burned to a CD-Audio!

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

Torrent content:

1 - Rosanna.wav
2 - Make Believe.wav
3 - I Won't Hold You Back.wav
4 - Good For You.wav
5 - It's A Feeling.wav
6 - Afraid Of Love.wav
7 - Lovers In The Night.wav
8 - We Made It.wav
9 - Waiting For Your Love.wav
10 - Africa.wav

*.wav files were encoded with DTS HD Encoder Suite @44.1kHz/1234kbps(Total stream Bitrate : 1411kbps)

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

How to use ?

You can play files on your computer with Foobar2000 with the plugin DTS.

Or you can burn a CD-DTS like a CD-Audio simply by adding .wav files to the burn list of your burning software (Nero, EAC,...). The CD-DTS can only be played on a CD/DVD player connected to a home cinema amplifier via a digital connection (Optical Toslink, Coaxial or HDMI).
